headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  CAMPBELL, KARL A.

snippet: CAMPBELL--Karl A.,32, of Georgia and Virginia, passed away on July 18, 2016 in Savannah, GA. A full obituary will be published at www.foxandweeks.com. Fox & Weeks Funeral Directors, Hodgson Chapel. 1/3...
lead_paragraph: CAMPBELL--Karl A.,32, of Georgia and Virginia, passed away on July 18, 2016 in Savannah, GA. A full obituary will be published at www.foxandweeks.com. Fox & Weeks Funeral Directors, Hodgson Chapel. 1/3
